document_data.name: Mixi
document_data.home:
[[Black Blade and Bloody Boar]],
[[Mulmaster]]{{Cite adventurers league/City of Danger|15}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Mixi''' ({{Pronounce|MIX|ee|refs={{Cite adventurers league/City of Danger|40}}}}) was a [[half-elf]] waitress in [[Mulmaster]] in [[1491 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Mixi was usually very gentle and professional. She cared deeply for her friends.
document_data.History: Mixi was a pirate on the [[Moonsea]] until a storm destroyed her ship. She decided to change her life and went to Mulmaster, where she began working as a maid. At the bar called the [[Black Blade and Bloody Boar]], she befriended [[Ilva]], a refugee from [[Phlan]]. Mixi became very worried about Ilva's strange behavior.
document_data.Activities: In 1491 DR, Mixi worked at the bar called the Black Blade and Bloody Boar in a lower part of the city.
